name: wgpu_native_zig

releases.name: v6.5.0
releases.body: Fixes an issue with `BindGroupEntryExtras` trying to declare an array of opaque structs rather than an array of pointers.

releases.name: v6.4.0
releases.body: Remove the `pub` keyword for `pub const _x = @import("x.zig")` in `root.zig`. Don't want to export the same thing again under a weird name.

releases.name: v6.3.0
releases.body: Removes usage of `usingnamespace` (#29 , #30 ). The changes should be backwards-compatible since the exports shouldn't have changed; only the way that they're exported has been changed.

releases.name: v6.2.0
releases.body: Fix "unknown-length pointer to opaque not allowed" issue with `Instance.enumerateAdapters()`.

releases.name: v6.1.0
releases.body: Updates defaults for BindGroupLayoutEntry to be more specific about binding usage: https://github.com/bronter/wgpu_native_zig/commit/d2aac5b4fd509760fd725752d1214c32311825f0

releases.name: v6.0.0 - wgpu-native v25.0.2.1
releases.body:
API changes for `wgpu-native` v24.x.x.x and v25.0.2.1
Diff to previous:
https://github.com/bronter/wgpu_native_zig/compare/5.x...6.x

releases.name: v5.1.0
releases.body: Adds some defaults to BindGroupLayoutEntry as per https://github.com/bronter/wgpu_native_zig/pull/18/files

releases.name: v5.0.0
releases.body: Fixes an issue with the `freeMembers` method of SurfaceCapabilities (#15)

releases.name: v4.0.0
releases.body: Some minor fixes to the public API as per https://github.com/bronter/wgpu_native_zig/pull/13/files

releases.name: v3.0.1
releases.body: Update build script for Zig 0.14.0 (no added features or breaking changes, just moving some things around to avoid using deprecated fields).

releases.name: v3.0.0
releases.body: Change package name and dependency hash format to be compatible with Zig 0.14.0

releases.name: v2.1.1
releases.body: Change package name to use underscores instead of dashes, that way it shows up correctly when installed through `zig fetch`

releases.name: v2.1.0
releases.body:
Enables additional targets:
- android-aarch64
- android-armv7
- android-x86
- android-x86_64
- ios-aarch64
- ios-aarch64-simulator
- ios-x86_64-simulator
- windows-aarch64-msvc

releases.name: v2.0.0 - wgpu-native 22.1.0.5
releases.body:
This updates the bindings to be compatible with wgpu-native 22.1.0.5: https://github.com/bronter/wgpu-native-zig/pull/9
Additionally, the compiler version requirement has been bumped to `0.14.0-dev.2577+271452d22`, due to a linker error with the previous version, which was resolved in 0.14: https://github.com/ziglang/zig/issues/15107

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
Initial version of `wgpu-native-zig`.
Bindings for `wgpu-native` version `0.19.4.1`

owner_bio: Software developer who dabbles in many different things.
